Documentation to stability_conditions¶

The project can be found at https://github.com/benjaminschmidt/stability_conditions.

An introduction to the theory of Bridgeland stability conditions and tilt stability can be found in [MS17].

  • stability_conditions package
    • Subpackages
      • stability_conditions.varieties package
        • Submodules
          • stability_conditions.varieties.bounds module
          • stability_conditions.varieties.p3 module
          • stability_conditions.varieties.variety module
    • Submodules
      • stability_conditions.library module
      • stability_conditions.slope module
      • stability_conditions.tilt module
      • stability_conditions.tilt_two module

References¶

[AB13]

D. Arcara and A. Bertram. Bridgeland-stable moduli spaces for math:K-trivial surfaces. J. Eur. Math. Soc. (JEMS), 15(1):1–38, 2013. With an appendix by Max Lieblich. arXiv:0708.2247

[BMT14]

A. Bayer, E. Macrì, and Y. Toda. Bridgeland stability conditions on threefolds I: Bogomolov-Gieseker type inequalities. J. Algebraic Geom., 23(1):117–163, 2014. arXiv:1103.5010

[Bri07]

T.Bridgeland. Stability conditions on triangulated categories. Ann. of Math. (2), 166(2):317-345, 2007. arXiv:math/0212237

[Bri08]

T. Bridgeland. Stability conditions on \(K3\) surfaces. Duke Math. J., 141(2):241-291, 2008. arXiv:math/0307164

[HL10]

D. Huybrechts and M. Lehn. The geometry of moduli spaces of sheaves. Cambridge Mathematical Library. Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, second edition, 2010.

[MS17]

E. Macrì and B. Schmidt. Lectures on Bridgeland stability. In Moduli of curves, volume 21 of Lect. Notes Unione Mat. Ital., pages 139-211. Springer, Cham, 2017. arXiv:1607.01262.
